description.narrative: The objectives of the intervention have been updated based on the New Strategic Note for UN Women 2021-2024 approved in October 2021. The main objective is "to contribute to the efforts carried out by Colombia to face the challenges and opportunities identified, mainly gender inequalities, to strengthen the empowerment of women and girls, their participation in the consolidation and stabilization in the territories and to guarantee their right to have a life free of violence". The new structure of the Strategic Note differs from the previous one, based on the government's request to align it to the UN Cooperation Framework (UNSSCDF, but there are no substantial changes. All previous components and working lines are included in the following three areas: 1) Stabilization: Peace with Legality; 2) Migration as a development factor; and 3) Technical assistance for the acceleration of catalyst Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs). Sweden's support is aligned with Areas 1 and 3 where peace issues and political and economic empowerment activities are included.

UN Women Country Office in Colombia has submitted a proposal to the Embassy of Sweden in Bogotá for funding of 49 MSEK to support the implementation of the Country’s Strategic Note in Colombia during the period June 1st, 2018 – December 31st, 2021.
The overall objective of the intervention is to contribute to strengthen the political and economic empowerment of women and their right to a life free from violence, both in the context of the conflict as well as beyond it, in a way that this supports the construction of stable and sustainable peace. In order to achieve this, UN Women will focus during this period in the following areas: 1) Women lead and participate in decision making at all levels; 2) Women, particularly the poorest and most excluded are economically empowered by and benefit from development; 3) Women and girls live a life free of violence; 4) Peace and security, and humanitarian action are shaped by women leadership and participation.

UN Women:s kontor i Colombia har överlämnat ett förslag till Sveriges Ambassad i Bogotá om finansiering på 49 MSEK för att stödja implementeringen av det Landspecifika Strategiska Dokumentet i Colombia (Strategic Note Colombia) under perioden den 1 juni 2018 – 31 december 2021.
Det övergripande syftet med insatsen är att stärka den politiska och ekonomiska egenmakten av kvinnor och deras rätt till ett liv fritt från våld, både i kontexten av konflikt likväl som bortom detta, på ett sätt som stödjer byggandet av en varaktig och hållbar fred. I avsikt att uppnå detta, kommer UN Women under denna period att fokusera på följande områden: 1) Kvinnor leder och medverkar i beslutstagande på alla nivåer; 2) Kvinnor, särskilt de fattigaste och mest exkluderade, åstadkommer ekonomisk egenmakt genom och med fördel av utveckling; 3) Kvinnor och flickor lever ett liv fritt från våld; 4) Fred och säkerhet, och humanitära aktioner är formade av kvinnligt ledarskap och deltagande.

participating-org.narrative: UNWOMEN/United Nations Entity for Gender Equality and the Empowerment of Women
UNWOMEN/United Nations Entity for Gender Equality and the Empowerment of Women

tag.narrative: 5.1 - Avskaffa alla former av diskriminering av alla kvinnor och flickor överallt
5.1 - End all forms of discrimination against all women and girls everywhere.
5.5 - Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life.
5.5 - Tillförsäkra kvinnor fullt och faktiskt deltagande och lika möjligheter till ledarskap på alla beslutsnivåer i det politiska, ekonomiska och offentliga livet.
5.c - Adopt and strengthen sound policies and enforceable legislation for the promotion of gender equality and the empowerment of all women and girls at all levels.
5.c - Anta och stärka välgrundad politik och genomförbar lagstiftning för att främja jämställdhet och öka alla kvinnors och flickors egenmakt på alla nivåer

title.narrative: Decision on support to UN Women Colombia 2018-2021

description.narrative: Swedish support has contributed to achieve results in three of the four areas of the Strategic Note: 1) Women lead and participate in decision making at all levels; 2) Women, particularly the poorest and most excluded, are economically empowered by and benefit from development; and 3) Peace and security, and humanitarian action are shaped by women leadership and participation. The intervention has contributed to implement the women, peace and security agenda in Colombia, mainly by strengthening a gender responsive transitional justice, the Integral System for Truth, Justice, Reparation and non-repetition, and supporting women's participation in peace building initiatives. It has also contributed to the political and economic empowerment of women through gender-responsive planning and budgeting, the development of the gender provisions of the Peace Agreement related with the local development plans (PDETs) and the integration of a gender-based approach in the Congress. Technical support has been given to the government for the elaboration of the national care policy and the redistribution of care work and to the private sector for increased gender equality. Activities related with non-hegemonic masculinities are being mainstreamed within the different components of the Strategic Note targeting governmental entities and civil society organizations.
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
